DOC.detailed_description: The goal randomize study evaluate efficacy i-gel conduit fiberoptic tracheal intubation compare air-Q child . Intubations perform resident train . The primary outcome time successful tracheal intubation . The investigator hypothesize resident intubate trachea faster use air-Q compare i-gel . The ease placement supraglottic airway device , fiberoptic grade laryngeal view , time device removal intubation , peri-operative complication also assess .
